project.name: farmer-cli
project.description: A modular Python CLI with a Rich UI for video downloading and system tools.

aTruth.summary: Preserve the original project purpose and modular Rich-based CLI design; append changes instead of overwriting intent.

coding_style.docstrings: Use triple-quoted docstrings; numpy style via ruff pydocstyle.
coding_style.comments: Keep inline comments rare and only for non-obvious logic.

version_control.commit_message_format: type: subject (example: refactor: restructure CLI application)

pull_requests.include_ui_artifacts: Screenshots or GIFs for UI/output changes.

security.secrets: Use .env and environment variables; never commit real secrets.

skills.name: create-plan
skills.description: Create a concise plan. Use when a user explicitly asks for a plan related to a coding task.

skills.name: gh-address-comments
skills.description: Help address review/issue comments on the open GitHub PR for the current branch using gh CLI; verify gh auth first and prompt the user to authenticate if not logged in.

skills.name: gh-fix-ci
skills.description: Inspect GitHub PR checks with gh, pull failing GitHub Actions logs, summarize failure context, then create a fix plan and implement after user approval.

skills.name: linear
skills.description: Manage issues, projects & team workflows in Linear.

skills.name: notion-knowledge-capture
skills.description: Capture conversations and decisions into structured Notion pages; use when turning chats/notes into wiki entries, how-tos, decisions, or FAQs with proper linking.

skills.name: notion-meeting-intelligence
skills.description: Prepare meeting materials with Notion context and Codex research; use when gathering context, drafting agendas/pre-reads, and tailoring materials to attendees.

skills.name: notion-research-documentation
skills.description: Research across Notion and synthesize into structured documentation; use when gathering info from multiple Notion sources to produce briefs, comparisons, or reports with citations.

skills.name: notion-spec-to-implementation
skills.description: Turn Notion specs into implementation plans, tasks, and progress tracking; use when implementing PRDs/feature specs and creating Notion plans + tasks from them.

skills.name: skill-creator
skills.description: Guide for creating effective skills. Use when users want to create or update a skill.

skills.name: skill-installer
skills.description: Install Codex skills into $CODEX_HOME/skills from a curated list or a GitHub repo path.

mcp_tools.name: functions.exec_command
mcp_tools.description: Run a shell command and return output.

mcp_tools.name: functions.write_stdin
mcp_tools.description: Write to an existing exec session.

mcp_tools.name: functions.list_mcp_resources
mcp_tools.description: List MCP resources from configured servers.

mcp_tools.name: functions.update_plan
mcp_tools.description: Create or update a task plan.

mcp_tools.name: functions.view_image
mcp_tools.description: Attach a local image to the conversation context.

mcp_tools.name: functions.apply_patch
mcp_tools.description: Apply a unified diff patch to files.

mcp_tools.name: functions.mcp__playwright__browser_*
mcp_tools.description: Playwright browser automation: navigate, click, fill, evaluate, snapshot, and screenshot.

mcp_tools.name: multi_tool_use.parallel
mcp_tools.description: Run multiple tool calls in parallel when safe.
